verses.verse: In the twelfth <S%H8147><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of Ahaz <S%H271><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> Hoshea <S%H1954><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Elah <S%H425><s%> began to reign <S%H4427><s%> in Samaria <S%H8111><s%> over Israel <S%H3478><s%> for nine <S%H8672><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%>

In the ninth <S%H8671><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of Hoshea <S%H1954><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Assyria <S%H804><s%> took <S%H3920><s%> Samaria, <S%H8111><s%> and carried <S%H1540><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> away <S%H1540><s%> to Assyria, <S%H804><s%> and placed <S%H3427><s%> them in Halah, <S%H2477><s%> and on the Habor, <S%H2249><s%> the river <S%H5104><s%> of Gozan, <S%H1470><s%> and in the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the Medes. <S%H4074><s%>

Yet Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> testified <S%H5749><s%> to Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and to Judah, <S%H3063><s%> by <S%H3027><s%> every prophet, <S%H5030><s%> and every seer, <S%H2374><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Turn <S%H7725><s%> from your evil <S%H7451><s%> ways, <S%H1870><s%> and keep <S%H8104><s%> my commandments <S%H4687><s%> and my statutes, <S%H2708><s%> according to all the law <S%H8451><s%> which I commanded <S%H6680><s%> your fathers, <S%H1><s%> and which I sent <S%H7971><s%> to you by <S%H3027><s%> my servants <S%H5650><s%> the prophets. <S%H5030><s%>"

Notwithstanding, <S%H8085><s%> they would not listen, but hardened <S%H7185><s%> their neck, <S%H6203><s%> like the neck <S%H6203><s%> of their fathers, <S%H1><s%> who didn't <S%H539><s%> believe in Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> their God. <S%H430><s%>
